There was no Mars-like planet. There was a moon called Egar around Meander (I think).

I checked Nova's development album and I didn't see any Evian (isn't that a brand of bottled water?) moons.
i really don't know
I dont think theres even a picture of eve in his album, there was one on kurts livestream though.
There is one of a lander descending through its atmosphere.

There was no Mars-like planet.

Yes, there is. It's the desert planet; you need to check Nova's development album here to keep up to date with all the planets.

forgot about that one.

Skyro, i think he was refering to novas guide to the solar system post.

Double post merged.
I was talking about Nova's old planet idea because someone was talking about the moon being tidally locked or something

Possible lay-out of Kerbol System, moons excluded (this picture presents my personal vision and not that of Squad ... !)

Actually, it's the following..

Kerbol

Lava Planet

Venus Analog (Eve)

Mars Analog (Red Planet)

Kerbin

Gas Giant 1
How is the Mars-alog going to work if it's closer to the sun than Kerbin? Will it only look like Mars but be warmer?
Damion: Lava planet is named Charr, as was told on live stream:)

Actually, it's the following..

OK, thanks for the info ... ! Based on our Solar System but with an interesting twist.

How is the Mars-alog going to work if it's closer to the sun than Kerbin? Will it only look like Mars but be warmer?

Well, I think that Kerbol is a red dwarf and the thick atmosphere of Kerbin prevents the planet from becoming a frozen world. The Mars equivalent will probably be several million km closer to Kerbol, but because of its thin atmosphere it could be colder than Kerbin. I think Eve might be very hot due to an extremely dense atmosphere and being even closer to Kerbol.
we all will find out eventually, cant wait to fly to the new planets though
Can we land on lava planet or the gas giant?

By lava planet do you mean the purple one? I think you can land on the "land" area of it, but I'm sure the liquid sections will destroy your ship.

You will not be able to land on the gas giant, the pressure and temperature will destroy your craft when you get near the ground. Should be interesting to try to enter its atmosphere temporarily and attempt to leave alive.
By lava planet i think they mean charr.

Also what kind of oceans are on these new planets/moons? Charr will have lava obviously (interested to see how lava is implemented) Eve's oceans are either mercury, molten lead, or some kind of metal since it has a metallic look to it. The waterish moon around Meander is....well water I suppose.
During Kurt's stream, did anyone else hear Nova say he was working on an electric propeller for use on planets where jets don't work? That sounds cool.

During Kurt's stream, did anyone else hear Nova say he was working on an electric propeller for use on planets where jets don't work? That sounds cool.

Yeah he was talking about how atmosopheres without oxygen wouldant work with jets so he wanted to add propellers for planets without oxygen but with an atmosophere.
How many new parts does everyone think will end up being made for .17? The propeller sounds very interesting, but is it confirmed that there will be any new engines?

I was thinking about yet again the last transmission of the lone kerbonaut during the livestream of Kurtjmac (live now) and I was asking myself if someone had figured out.

I was tweaking a little with paint.Net and it looked like a dragon or something.

So isn't it the Kraken Memorial?

Edited August 11, 2012 by Jon Tash

Well we will need something to propel the ships into deep space... Efichent engines, and new fuel perhaps.. My best gess is:

4 Tanks(1x1,1x2,2x1,2x2), 4 engines(1m, vectoring/nonvectoring 2m, vectoring/nonectoring), capsule, solar panes... Think this is the bare minimum..

I was thinking about yet again the last transmission of the lone kerbonaut during the livestream of Kurtjmac (live now) and I was asking myself if someone had figured out.

I was twiking a little with paint.Net and it looked like a dragon or something.

So isn't it the Kraken Memorial?

Oooh, maybe. But as suggested by you I think, upside down it also looked like some sort of curiosity style landing with either a big rock; the rise of one of the planets or moons; or... the Tomb of the Space Kraken. Nova did say he wasn't going to tell us what it was, so since he's a nice guy, it should be pretty easy to figure out once the update comes out. This isn't off topic is it?
lava planet? you mean like mustafar from star wars... that is awsome I know where im going first
If we get more parts, i hope item list will get another sort system, cause this system is not enough for actual count of parts ingame, not talking about after update..
